title: Plat 5 LFT Serious 5s/LFM
body:
IGN: LPL GodlikePang
Rank: Plat 5
Positions: Jungle{{champion:59}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:32}} , Support{{champion:412}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:25}} , Can fill AD{{champion:81}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:15}}  and Mid{{champion:238}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:101}} , Top is horrible.
Age: 16
S3:Bronze 
S4:Plat
Peak: Diamond 5 ~Feb 2015 and sold that account. (Then i started over again on a new account.)
Availabilities: Varies Mon/Tue/Wed/Thu/Fri/Sun, usually available 5PM-1AM AEST. Do have a part time job, roster will be notified 1 week earlier.
Looking for a serious decent team that have the potential and wanting to climb for at least diamond in 5s this season. (Can also create a team if no teams are available.

Contact me through in game (IGN: LPL GodlikePang) or comment below with your details and availabilities.

Thanks everyone. :)

replies.body: Yeah, you're welcome to join mine we're looking for a serious player right now atm. Add me: WQLFY if you're interested ^_^
